home.title: Theta Engineering
home.subtitle: Professional Engineering Solutions
home.expertiseMainText: At Theta Engineering, everything revolves around bringing together vision and precision. We translate your construction plans into smart, safe, and sustainable structural solutions. With attention to detail and a clear view of the future, we ensure that every design is correct from concept to execution. Where vision meets precision: that is the strength behind our approach.
home.expertiseSupportText: We support both private and business clients in residential construction, utility construction, and industry. Whether it's a small-scale renovation or a large new construction project: Theta Engineering delivers reliable, high-quality, and practical solutions.
home.expertiseServicesTitle: Our services consist of four core specializations:
home.expertiseDesc: Years of experience in engineering solutions
home.qualityDesc: Commitment to excellence in every project
home.whyChooseUsDesc: Discover what sets us apart in the engineering industry
home.reliabilityDesc: We deliver consistent, high-quality results you can trust
home.efficiencyDesc: Optimized processes that save time and resources
home.supportDesc: 24/7 customer service and ongoing project support
home.processDesc: A structured approach to successful projects
home.step1Desc: We listen to your needs and analyze your requirements
home.step2Desc: Development of a detailed project plan and timeline
home.step4Desc: Quality assurance and timely project completion
home.ctaDesc: Contact us today and discover how we can help with your project

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Engineering Excellence
about.intro: We are an engineering firm specialized in designing and calculating structures for both private and business clients. Our team of experienced structural engineers and project managers at master's level combines vision and precision to ensure every project is correct in every detail.
about.mission: We stand for quality, customer focus, and sustainable partnerships. With a clear view of the future, we work on safe, efficient, and reliable structural solutions.
about.background: After years of experience, we have combined our strengths into one team. This collective expertise forms the foundation for our work in residential construction, utility construction, and industry.
about.expertiseIntro: We deliver smart, safe, and sustainable solutions in four core areas:
about.expertiseOutro: Whether it's new construction, renovation, or existing construction, we provide clear, practical, and future-proof advice.
about.workProcessIntro: Our approach is clear and efficient:
about.contactText: Would you like to discuss your project with us? Get in touch.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Engineering Solutions
services.serviceDescription: Detailed description of engineering service {item}. This section will be customized with specific services provided by Theta Engineering.

service1.title: Structural design and calculations
service1.intro: A successful construction project starts with a clear and reliable structural design.
services: Structural calculations for new construction, renovation, and transformations
Structural advice in every phase of the project
service1.description: We actively think along about technical possibilities, sustainability, material choices, and feasibility. This ensures a safe, efficient, and future-proof construction.

service2.title: Assessment of structural safety
service2.intro: Are you renovating, renovating, or transforming? Then insight into the current structural condition is essential.
services: Load-bearing capacity of floors, roofs, and walls
Permissibility of breakthroughs and layout changes
service2.description: With a clear report and concrete advice, you know exactly what is possible and what steps are needed to safely realize your plans.

service3.title: Project management
service3.intro: Complex projects involve more than just technology. Theta Engineering connects all disciplines into one efficient and integrated design. We coordinate the process, maintain overview, and monitor quality, planning, and collaboration.
service3.servicesIntro: Our project management services are deployed in:
service3.description: With a results-oriented approach, we ensure that every project runs smoothly from the first idea to realization.

service4.title: Inspection and structural advice
service4.intro: We perform expert inspections of existing buildings to map the technical condition, safety, and possible risks. Based on our findings, we provide practical and substantiated structural advice for repair, maintenance, or improvement.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.subtitle: Completed Engineering Projects
projects.noProjects: No projects available yet. Check back soon!

careers.title: Careers
careers.subtitle: Join our team of engineering professionals
careers.description1: Theta Engineering is always looking for talented engineers and technical professionals to join our team. We offer opportunities for both full-time positions and freelance/ZZP (zelfstandige zonder personeel) collaborations.
careers.description2: We are particularly interested in technical drafters and modelers (technisch tekenaars/modelleurs) who can contribute to our diverse range of projects.
careers.description3: If you're interested in working with us, please contact us through our contact form or send your resume to our team.

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Settings
cookieConsent.description: This website uses cookies to improve user experience and to comply with GDPR requirements. We only use necessary cookies and analytical cookies (with your consent).
cookieConsent.necessaryDesc: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be disabled.
cookieConsent.analyticsDesc: These cookies help us understand how visitors use the website by collecting information anonymously.
cookieConsent.marketingDesc: These cookies are used to display relevant advertisements and marketing content.
